text: Ride a Crooked Mile is a 1938 American Western film directed by Alfred E. Green and written by Jack Moffitt and Ferdinand Reyher. The film stars Akim Tamiroff, Leif Erickson, Frances Farmer, Lynne Overman, John Miljan and J. M. Kerrigan. The film was released on December 9, 1938, by Paramount Pictures. ==Plot== == Cast == *Akim Tamiroff as Mike Balan *Leif Erickson as Johnny Simpkins *Frances Farmer as Trina *Lynne Overman as Oklahoma *John Miljan as Lt. Col. Stuart *J. M. Kerrigan as Sgt.
